title: ISweptFlangeFeatureData.UseDefaultRadius
description: Gets or sets whether to use the bend radius from the original sheet metal feature in this swept flange feature.
returns: True to use the original sheet metal bend radius, false to use a custom bend radius (see Remarks )
remarks:
If this property is false, then use
ISweptFlangeFeatureData::BendRadius
to get or set a custom bend radius.
